wiki.content:
"Lay All Your Love On Me" went to #1 on the U.S. Hot Dance Club Play chart in the Spring of 1981.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "Lay All Your Love On Me" went to #1 on the U.S. Hot Dance Club Play chart in the Spring of 1981.

track.name: Lay All Your Love on Me
comments:
Just googled Goosepimps absolutely nothing to define it.Oh well i've invented a new word.Have you heard Agnetha Faltskog's new album entitled "A"? it's absolutely sensational especially the track "DANCE YOUR PAIN AWAY" a real throw back to the late 1970's "VOULEZ - VOUS ALBUM.
This song will be a smash hit in the clubs all over the world this summer.
Think I prefer the 'goosepimps' Grant!! haha :-D
Goosebumps yeah what was i thinking of?.
Good song and romantic notion in the message.The thought of Agnetha standing in front of me staring in to her angelic eyes fills me up with goosepimps.
Gets ya jiggin' does this one!!!!
As I said before, excellent emotions...
I never know how to feel about this song, it's somewhere between heartbreaking sadness, and deep joy... That's terrible when you don't know how to feel. [2]
